Manufacturer Edwards
Model XDS35i
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 21.0 CFM (593.4 l/m)

Other Information

Power requirements:
200-230 V at 5A, 50/60 Hz, 1 Phase or
100-120V at 8.5A, 50/60 Hz, 1 Phase
